item.description: Changes, growth, and uncontrolled factors affect a project’s scope at any point after the project begins. Scope creep sources: External Internal External Customer requests Environment shift Changes in technology Product improvements Process changes Solutions Make project plan visible Get clarity on project requirements Set group rules and expectations for stakeholder involvement Role and responsibility during execution and review Create a plan for dealing with out-of-scope requests Agree on who can make a request Put your agreements and plans in writing
